# Notations

- $O_i$ = position $i$ => a specific node in a specific motif
- $a_i$: abundance of species at position i
- $a_{i,j}$: abundance of node i with pathway of effects
- $K^i$ set of all pathways of effects possible for position $i$
- $K_j$ pathway of effects j
- $k_j$ unitary pathway effects $j$
- $K_j$ is made of unitary pathway effects
- $O_i$: event "focal species occupies position i"
- $P_{K_j | O_i}$: $P(\text{"pathway of effect j"} | \text{"focal species occupies position i"})$
- NB: $P_{K_j | O_i} = f(\text{"stressors"})$



# Sensitivity

$$s_{i,j} = \frac{a_{i,j} - a_i}{a_i}$$

$$S_{i, j} = \frac{1}{n} \sum_{l = 1}^n s_{i,j}$$


# Amplification

$$A_{i, j} = S_{i, K_j} - \sum_{k_j \in K_j} S_{i, j}$$


# Expectations

$$S_i = \sum_{j \in K^i} P_{K_j | O_i}S_{i, j}$$

For a given species the expected sensitivity is

$$S = \sum_i P(O_i) \sum_j P_{K_j | O_i}S_{i, j}$$

NB: $\sum_i P(O_i)$ may not sum to 1 (to be determined).


works the same way for $A_{i, j}$


## Position sensitivity

$$S_i = \frac{1}{\text{Card}(K^i)}\sum_{j \in K^i} S_{i, j}$$
